summary: Completed comprehensive testing of integrated portal platform. Backend APIs working perfectly (14/14 endpoints), admin interface fully functional, portal magic link validation working, mobile-first design implemented correctly. Minor session management issue identified in portal.

integration_issues.issue: Portal sessions expire quickly causing redirects to login page during navigation testing

passed_tests: Admin dashboard stats display (1 client, 0 orders, $0.00 ledger)
Admin clients page navigation and display
Portal dashboard loading with financial summary
Mobile viewport (375px) display without zoom issues
Desktop viewport with mobile-first design constraint
All 14 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
Portal transactions, credentials, referrals, withdrawals APIs
action_item_for_main_agent: Investigate portal session management - sessions expire too quickly causing navigation issues. Consider increasing session timeout or implementing session refresh mechanism.
